text: Servir y proteger (English: Serve and protect) is a police drama soap opera produced by Plano a Plano for Televisión Española. The series premiered on La1 on April 24, 2017.Servir y proteger', el lunes 24 de abril, estreno en La 1 www.rtve.es It tells the daily routine of a CNP police station on Madrid. Each season consists in 200 episodes. The first season was broadcast from April 24, 2017 to February 15, 2018 and the soap opera was renewed in late 2017 for a second season which started on February 16. It was renewed for a third season in May 2018. A fourth season was approved in June 2019. It was renewed for a fifth season in August 2020. ==Plot== The series is about the day to day of a police station in a neighbourhood south of Madrid. The cases investigated by police officers are less serious offenses, although they have a great impact on the lives of those affected: small conflicts of a social nature, with immigrants, evictions, or violence against women. With the police station as the centre of the plot, it shows the characters, their problems, anxieties, hopes and joys.Servir y proteger.
